description: This issue was made by Max Bunker putting together various drawings previously released in other stories and series, the most of them drawn by Magnus.
name: Il giorno della disperazione

description: High school student Kei Nagai is killed in a traffic accident, but immediately revives to learn that he may not be human at all. Instead, he may be a Demi-Human, a mysterious almost immortal being blessed with amazing super-human abilities. Scared, he runs away, and is aided in his escape from society by his friend Kai. Unfortunately for Kei, the manhunt is on and he will soon be caught within a conflict between mankind and other Demi-Humans as they prepare to fight for global supremacy.
name: Vol. 5

description:
English teacher Irina's assassination mentor makes an appearance and the two compete-using special agent Karasuma as their target. Another transfer student/would-be assassin joins the class, accompanied by a guardian who claims to be Koro Sensei's...little brother?! A tentacle showdown ensues, sending everyone into a tentacle tizzy. Then, the 3-E students face humiliation yet again during a school baseball exhibition match. Plus, more secrets of Koro Sensei's mysterious past revealed...!

Chapter Titles

  • Class 26: Time for the Master
  • Class 27: Overcoming Shortcomings in Time
  • Class 28: Movie Time!
  • Class 29: Time for Another Transfer Student - 2nd Period
  • Class 30: Time to Face the Unbelievable
  • Class 31: A Rough Battle This Time
  • Class 32: Bonding Time
  • Class 33: Time to Play Ball
  • Class 34: Time for Offense
name: Time to Face the Unbelievable

description:
The Exwires learn the tragic story of what happened to Izumo’s mother, Tamamo, when the Illuminati’s mad Professor Gedoin sought her out in order to conduct his insane experiments. Now Izumo has been captured and is next on the professor’s list of test subjects. Rin, Yukio, Shiemi, Suguro and Konekomaru head deep into Dream Town Inari to rescue Izumo, but what they find there is a horror none of them ever expected…

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 53: This Is the Real Me
  • Chapter 54: I'm Not Going Back to the Order
  • Chapter 55: Like Siblings
  • Chapter 56: Intermedio
  • Chapter 57: Opening Rounds
name: Vol. 13

description:
The outrageous manga parody of the high school club genre continues!

Kazama Kenji thinks he's a delinquent. He's got the look, the style and the attitude to match--he even has a second-rate entourage of sorts. Deep down, however, Kazama is a good-hearted kid who finds himself and his loyal gang in over their heads when they stumble upon the Game Creation Club. The club's formidable members, Chitose, Sakura, Minami, and Roka, are four girls whom he might actually be attracted to if they weren't so freaking weird.

The girls claim to have otherworldly powers which they use to defeat Kazama's gang and force him to join their offbeat club. Can Kazama resist the girls' bizarre charms and return to some semblance of a normal, everyday life…or is it "game over" for our hapless hero?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 29: The Legendarily Amazing Takao-sempai!
  • Chapter 30: Bumble Tumble Bomp
  • Chapter 31: I Guess You Were the Easiest Target?
  • Chapter 32: Like, Abolish the Game Dev. Club (Temp)
  • Chapter 33: You Can't Crack a Diamond
  • Chapter 34: He's Betting That?!
  • Chapter 35: She Looks Perfectly Content to Play Alone
  • Chapter 36: My Final Move Is...
  • Bonus Manga #1
  • Bonus Manga #2
name: Vol. 5

description:
Includes Vols. 25, 26, 27

Captain Ginyu has used his transforming power to exchange bodies with Goku. With Goku's friends in a pinch, and Goku's life hanging by a thread, Gohan and Kuririn must use the the seven Dragon Balls of Namek to summon the mighty Dragon Lord, who can grant any three wishes. Can Goku get his body back and defeat Captain Ginyu? And if the Dragon Lord is summoned, can Gohan and Kuririn prevent Vegeta and Freeza from wishing for immortality for themselves?

Chapter Titles

Volume 25

The Wrath of Freeza

  • Tale 289: Ginyu's Mistake!
  • Tale 290: The Final Switch
  • Tale 291: Nail's Sacrifice
  • Tale 292: The True Dragon God
  • Tale 293: The Three Wishes
  • Tale 294: The Last Wish
  • Tale 295: The Assimilation
  • Tale 296: The Transformation
  • Tale 297: Freeza vs. Gohan
  • Tale 298: Freeza vs. Gohan, Part 2
  • Tale 299: The Fourth Warrior
  • Tale 300: Freeza vs. Piccolo

Volume 26

Goku vs. Freeza

  • Tale 301: Freeza vs. Piccolo, Part 2
  • Tale 302: Freeza's Third Form
  • Tale 303: Vegeta's Ploy
  • Tale 304: The Final Transformation
  • Tale 305: Will It Be Freeza? Or Vegeta?
  • Tale 306: Son Goku...Resurrected!!
  • Tale 307: The Ultimate Battle Begins!
  • Tale 308: The Death of Vegeta
  • Tale 309: Underwater Battle
  • Tale 310: Aerial Battle
  • Tale 311: Hand to Foot
  • Tale 312: 50% Maximum Power
  • Tale 313: Kaiô-Ken Times 20!!!

Volume 27

The Super Saiyan

  • Tale 314: The Great Genki-Dama
  • Tale 315: The Last Chance
  • Tale 316: The Galaxy Strikes Back
  • Tale 317: Life or Death
  • Tale 318: The Super Saiyan
  • Tale 319: The Tables Turn
  • Tale 320: The End of Namek?
  • Tale 321: Maximum Desperation
  • Tale 322: Two Warriors, One Finish
  • Tale 323: The Two Wishes
  • Tale 324: The Quiet, Fierce Battle
  • Tale 325: Son Goku Quits
name: Vol. 9

description:
TWO DRAGONS, THREE SLAYERS

With her curse magic, Kyoka has deprived Erza of all her senses—except pain, which she has amplified into excruciating torture! But even in these hopeless circumstances, the Fairy Queen continues to counterattack!

Meanwhile, the duels between Igneel and Acnologia and between Natsu and the Underworld King rage on, as dragon father and wizard son struggle to grab onto a sliver of hope! The twin dragons of Sabertooth, Rogue and Sting, show up to help. Can the joint efforts of three dragon slayers force Mard Geer to get serious? The critical moment arrives in the battle between fairies and demons!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 404: 00:00
  • Chapter 405: Tartaros Arc, Part Six: Magna Carta
  • Chapter 406: The Girl in the Crystal
  • Chapter 407: To Destroy My Very Body
  • Chapter 408: The Definitive Demon
  • Chapter 409: Thread of Black and White
  • Chapter 410: Memento Mori
  • Chapter 411: To Respond in Kind
  • Chapter 412: Soaring in Ishgal
name: Volume 48

description:
The contestants for the Totsuki Institute’s annual Fall Classic have been chosen! A decades-old event, the Fall Classic has been the grand stage for fierce cooking battles for years. The chosen participants, each aiming to be crowned winner, begin their training! But as they do, someone special visits Polaris Dorm.

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 40: Homecoming
  • Chapter 41: The Man Called "Shura"
  • Chapter 42: A Wake-Up Kiss
  • Chapter 43: The Chef Who Wandered the World
  • Chapter 44: Unexpected Straight Punch
  • Chapter 45: The Accompanist to Fragrance and Spice
  • Chapter 46: Crouching Dragon Ascends
  • Chapter 47: Memories of Battle
  • Chapter 48: The Unknown Knows
  • Side Story - Miss Nikumi's Midsummer Fun
name: Memories of Battle

description:
Miho Nishizumi, a new transfer student to Ooarai All-Girls High School, would like nothing more than to enjoy a peaceful, stress-free school life. Unfortunately, her new school just revived its tankery program and enlists Miho to put together a team so that they may compete in a national tournament.

As Miho struggles to overcome her turbulent past with tanks, she must first learn to tread lightly with her eccentric companions. Can Miho possibly plow through the challenges and master the art of tankery, or will she get left behind in the dust?
name: Vo. 4

description: Nanami’s journey to the past was a success! She found a way to break the curse and save Tomoe, and he even admitted that he has feelings for her. Now they’re both ready to enjoy life as a happy couple. Tomoe is hoping to spend some special alone time with Nanami, but instead they go on a school trip to Okinawa with the entire grade—and things go from tropical paradise to yokai nightmare in no time!
name: Vol. 18

description:
Spring is in the air, but doubts about the future bloom along with the flowers for Sawako and her friends. A bright spot in this season of worry is White Day, where the boys return gifts for the ones they received on Valentine’s Day. Kazehaya has a very special gift in store for Sawako!

Chapter Titles

  • Episode 84: White Day
  • Episode 85: Final Year
  • Episode 86: Exam Preparation
  • Episode 87: Desired Path
name: Volume 21

volume.name: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You

description:
THINGS CHANGE… BIT BY BIT

The second year of high school is here, but Haru’s been moved to another class all by himself! At first, the former chronic truant refuses even to enter the strange classroom, but with Shizuku’s “encouragement,” he slowly comes to terms with the change. Shizuku begins to feel she’s really reaching Haru, especially compared to how things used to be, but then the unexpected arrival of a new student throws things out of whack, and Yamaken finally begins to move… What could possibly come next?
name: Things Change...Bit By Bit

description:
Naruto and the Sage of Six Paths

In order to face off against Madara and his newly acquired Six Paths power, Guy pulls out his most dangerous move. Guy has put his very life on the line, but is it enough against Madara? Meanwhile, as Naruto fights on the edge of death, he meets a special figure who may change the entire direction of the battle!

Chapter Titles

  • Number 669: The Eight Inner Gates Formation!!
  • Number 670: He of the Beginning...!!
  • Number 671: Naruto and the Sage of the Six Paths!!
  • Number 672: Night Guy!!
  • Number 673: We Will…!!
  • Number 674: Sasuke's Rinnegan
  • Number 675: Your Current Dream
  • Number 676: The Infinite Dream
  • Number 677: The Infinite Tsukuyomi
  • Number 678: My Will Is...
  • Number 679: She of the Beginning
name: Naruto and the Sage of Six Paths

description:
A local exorcist has passed away, leaving behind a study packed with a lifetime of important yokai research. But his family are normal and don’t know where he’s hidden his workroom. Now all the exorcists in the area are on the hunt for the mysterious library. But Natsume can’t decide what is more dangerous—letting the other exorcists find the collection, or discovering it himself!

Contains Chapter 71 - 73 & Special Episode: A Fragment of a Dream.
name: Vol. 18

description:
Awesome adventures inspired by the best-selling Pokémon X and Y video games! All your favorite Pokémon game characters jump out of the screen into the pages of this action-packed manga!

X, Y and company meet Trevor's online friend Professor Sycamore...but X is suspicious of him. Trevor sets out to get his Holo Caster repaired by Lysandre...who turns out to be another suspicious character. And finally, Alexa is excited about her journalism scoop but is unexpectedly betrayed! Can our friends trust anyone...?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 8: What Does Charmander Do When It Dozes?
  • Chapter 9: Chespin Sows the Seeds of Change
  • Chapter 10: Pangoro Poses a Problem
name: Volume 3

description:
The comedy starts when the cross-dressing begins!

The Kobayashi twins, Mego and Mitsuru, were named after historical figures, but only Mego has grown up with a taste for history. So when Mitsuru is in danger of losing his weekends to extra history classes, he convinces his sister to swap clothes with him and ace his tests! After all, how hard can it be for them to play each other?

Contents

  • So Cute It Hurts!!
  • So Cute! X Suzuki-kun: The Miraculous Collab Manga!!!
name: Vol. 1

description:
The Tiger's Tears

Ichiryu, head of the IGO, and Midora, head of the nefarious Gourmet Corp., were once like brothers under the tutelage of Gourmet God Acacia, but now they are bitter rivals locked in a mortal combat of chopsticks vs. tongue. We take a trip hundreds of years into the past to see just what went wrong when Gourmet God Acacia’s three disciples Ichiryu, Jiro and Midora trained alongside their mentor, Acacia, and God Chef Froese to turn Midora into the monster he is today.

Chapter Titles

  • Gourmet 244: Puzzling Identity!!
  • Gourmet 245: At the End!!
  • Gourmet 246: One More Final Battle!!
  • Gourmet 247: Ichiryu and Midora Collide!!
  • Gourmet 248: Ichiryu's Power!!
  • Gourmet 249: Turning of the Tide!!
  • Gourmet 250: Bottomless Hunger!!
  • Gourmet 251: Acacia and His Three Disciples!!
  • Gourmet 252: Acacia's Fairy Tales!!
  • Gourmet 253: The Tiger's Tears!!
name: The Tiger's Tears

description:
Hime finally got the hang of her character on Cruel Octalia, and the fans really took notice! But now people are complaining that they’ve never seen Shiro. Hime feels ready for her alter ego to go public, but is she ready for the big reveal her producer has planned…live on stage with AQUA?!

Contains Chapter 59 - 64.
name: Vol. 11

description: The Junior Braves of Tribe 65 return from a camping trip to find swarms of bloodthirsty mutants have overrun their town, bringing death and destruction everywhere they go! With their families missing and their homes destroyed, these plucky kids must use all their scouting talents, combined smarts, and teamwork to survive the end of the world!
name: Book 1: A Brave Is Brave Part 5 of 6

description: Liz, Bodey, Maude, and Justine's band, Odd Schnozz and the Odd Squad, are sure to win this year's Battle of the Bands. But when a talking chimp, who claims to be a scientist from the mysterious organization B.L.A.N.K., interrupts their practice session, the band's got a whole new set of problems. Now B.L.A.N.K. agents are closing in, determined to recapture the escaped chimp before he becomes a liability. Jeffrey Burandt (Americans UK) and Dennis Culver (Edison Rex) bring you this thrilling tale of cyborg animals and punk rock teenagers. 1, 2, 3, 4!
name: Chapter Four

first_appearance_teams.name: Odd Schnozz and the Odd Squad

team_credits.name: Odd Schnozz and the Odd Squad

volume.name: Odd Schnozz and the Odd Squad

description: While Barry and Joe attempt to enjoy some well-earned rest and relaxation, The Flash's speedy services are needed all over the city!
name: Day In The Life

description: Barbara Gordon makes a critical decision and Harley Quinn contemplates what to do next with the captive Billy Batson.
name: Chapter Five: Choices

volume.name: Injustice: Gods Among Us Year Four

description: The ultimate GD information guide continues! This issue of the indispensable handbook series will tell you exactly where's where in the GD-verse with a guide to realms and dimensions! Get the location lowdown on places and spaces from T'uala to Yl'Dahjim, from Agency Zero Facilities to Quagmire USA! It's GD A to Z! Don't miss a single issue!

volume.name: Gold Digger Sourcebook, The Official Handbook Of The GD Universe

name: Parola d'ordine sparare a vista su Kriminal
